## toWords() function

From the provided sentence you return just the words in an array.

All commas and other punctuation marks will be removed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function toWords(sentence: string): string[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  sentence | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

string\[\]
